article: the bush administration praised sunday 's withdrawal of israeli armor and soldiers from palestinian authority headquarters and urged both sides in the middle east conflict to work toward peace .
abstract: white house pleased with israeli withdrawal urges both sides to work toward peace with bc-israel-palestinians
